weloveclouds.commons.kvstore.models.messages

Interface IKVAdminMessage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KVAdminMessage, KVAdminMessageProxy

    public interface IKVAdminMessage
    Represents an administrative message between the ECS and the KVServer.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IKVAdminMessage.StatusType

    • Method Detail

      • getStatus

        IKVAdminMessage.StatusType getStatus()
        Returns:
        a status string that is used to identify request types, response types and error types associated to the message

      • getRingMetadata

        RingMetadata getRingMetadata()
        Returns:
        the ring metadata parts (>) for each server

      • getTargetServerInfo

        RingMetadataPart getTargetServerInfo()
        Returns:
        the IP+port of the target server to which entries denoted by the encapsulated HashRange have to be transferred

      • getReplicaConnectionInfos

        java.util.Set<ServerConnectionInfo> getReplicaConnectionInfos()
        Returns:
        connection information about the replicas, e.g. on which IP + port are they accessible

      • getRemovableRange

        HashRange getRemovableRange()
        Returns:
        the range whose entries shall be removed from the server

      • getResponseMessage

        java.lang.String getResponseMessage()
        Returns:
        if the message is a response then the message text can be obtained here
